sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Container, Typography, Card, CardContent, Button, Grid } from '@mui/material'; import { PlayArrow as PlayArrowIcon, OpenInNew as OpenInNewIcon } from '@mui/icons-material'; const One = () => { return ( Action Research Studies: Instructional Strategies To uncover the most impactful student-centered instructional methods and diverse learning strategies, action research was undertaken to explore teacher perspectives. This investigation aimed to identify the most effective tools and resources assisting educators in crafting inclusive, research-based lesson plans that prioritize student engagement. For an insightful presentation of these findings, watch the Canva Video Presentation titled "Cultural Diversity." While the Canva Video Presentation summarizes key qualitative research findings, quantitative research revealed the Universal Design for Learning strategy as the most effective multimodal learning approach in the classroom, as illustrated in the accompanying data. Canva Video Presentation link:{' '} ); } export default One;
